Simon Cowell `` I wanted to do a show where judges could help competitors on a weekly basis,'' Simon Cowell said, comparing the job to his days as an A&R rep at a record label. It's more interesting to me; it definitely gives me something more to do. When an artist wins, you win. It really does become an incredible competition with judges, in a way more than the artists, because we don't pretend to like each other.
